trans-unit.source: Exposes a generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of designer glyphs associated with an activity designer.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection contains all designer glyphs that appear on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> class with which the collection is associated.
You can access the contents of the ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection through the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Glyphs%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> class that is empty and has the default initial capacity.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> class that contains elements copied from the specified generic collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref>, and has sufficient capacity to accommodate the number of elements copied.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> class that contains elements copied from the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> and has sufficient capacity to accommodate the number of elements copied.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection"></xref> from which to copy collection elements.
